title: Making Your Mark as CEO in Your First 100 Days
description: After just three years at Abacus Wealth Partners, Mary Beth Storjohann was promoted into the co-CEO role of this $4 billion RIA. Here's the story of how she hit the ground running.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: After just three years at Abacus Wealth Partners, Mary Beth Storjohann was promoted into the co-CEO role of this $4 billion RIA. Here's the story of how she hit the ground running.
